ygData.subject: RE: Hello?  Hello?
ygData.msgSnippet: Not dead. Of course, with XMas and holidays I don t expect many of us will be playing as much EQ. Well, I would if I *could* but damned if I don t have to go
ygData.messageBody:
Not dead. Of course, with XMas and holidays I don't expect many of us will
be playing as much EQ. Well, I would if I *could* but damned if I don't have
to go home for vacation. Would you believe I don't even own a modem!? I have
to go buy one!

As an aside, for pure exp at a higher level, I found a great spot last
night. In Sol B by the zone in near the foreman room/singe's spawn. Just
fight the local to that room and pull whatever you can. Zone is right there
so moderately safe (our cleric died on a zone out because some jerk was
pulling huge, unannounced trains in Sol A.) and I got a bub and a half in
about 2.5 hours I think it was. That's amazing for me and I assume many of
you all too.

Level 20- Go check out the treants in S Karana in a level or twow if you
dont' mind bad qeynos guard faction (well, druids too, but who cares about
druids? =D) You can level real fast there.

happy holidays all

virt
